ingredients.item: 300g pack essential Waitrose 10 Cod Fish Fingers

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7. Place the fish fingers on a baking tray and bake for 14 minutes.
Meanwhile, cook the peas in boiling water for 3-4 minutes, drain, then purée with the tartare sauce in a processor.
Spread the purée over the wraps, add lettuce and top with fish fingers. Fold the sides and roll up. Serve with chips and any remaining lettuce, drizzled with balsamic vinegar.
